org.springframework.statemachine.config.configurers

Class DefaultJunctionTransitionConfigurer<S,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.statemachine.config.common.annotation.AnnotationConfigurerAdapter<TransitionsData<S,E>,StateMachineTransitionConfigurer<S,E>,StateMachineTransitionBuilder<S,E>>
      • org.springframework.statemachine.config.configurers.DefaultJunctionTransitionConfigurer<S,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of state
    E - the type of event
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotationConfigurer<TransitionsData<S,E>,StateMachineTransitionBuilder<S,E>>, AnnotationConfigurerBuilder<StateMachineTransitionConfigurer<S,E>>, JunctionTransitionConfigurer<S,E>

    public class DefaultJunctionTransitionConfigurer<S,E>
extends AnnotationConfigurerAdapter<TransitionsData<S,E>,StateMachineTransitionConfigurer<S,E>,StateMachineTransitionBuilder<S,E>>
implements JunctionTransitionConfigurer<S,E>
    Default implementation of a JunctionTransitionConfigurer.
    Author:
    Janne Valkealahti
